metadata.title: CVE-2021-20177 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel's implementation of string matchingwithin a packet. A privileged user (with root or CAP_NET_ADMIN) wheninserting iptables rules could insert a rule which can panic the system.Kernel before kernel 5.5-rc1 is affected.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
